fine_dining.name: Restaurant Martin Wishart
fine_dining.atmosphere: Intimate waterfront dining with crisp linens
fine_dining.booking_tips: Reserve 4-6 weeks in advance, noting dietary preferences when booking.
fine_dining.local_tips: Ask for the Scottish cheese trolley and sommelier pairings.

fine_dining.name: The Kitchin
fine_dining.atmosphere: Industrial-chic dining room with open kitchen
fine_dining.booking_tips: Bookings open three months ahead; lunch offers the best availability.
fine_dining.local_tips: Arrive early for a pre-dinner cocktail at the adjacent Kitchin Bar.

fine_dining.name: Number One at The Balmoral
signature_dishes: North Sea cod with shellfish bisque
fine_dining.atmosphere: Warm, understated luxury with tactile fabrics
fine_dining.booking_tips: Request the chef's counter for a view into the kitchen.
fine_dining.local_tips: Pair tasting menus with rare whisky drams curated by the hotel's experts.

fine_dining.name: Fhior
fine_dining.booking_tips: Tasting menus change weekly; note allergies in advance.
fine_dining.local_tips: Opt for the juice pairing for an inventive non-alcoholic experience.

casual_dining.name: Dishoom Edinburgh
casual_dining.atmosphere: Vintage Irani cafe with lively buzz
casual_dining.booking_tips: Join the virtual queue via the app during peak evenings.
casual_dining.local_tips: Order a round of chaijito cocktails during the evening happy hour.

casual_dining.name: Mother India's Cafe
casual_dining.atmosphere: Relaxed townhouse dining with shareable plates
casual_dining.booking_tips: Call ahead for groups; small tables usually available off-peak.
casual_dining.local_tips: Mix and match half portions to sample a wide range of dishes.

casual_dining.name: Makar's Mash Bar
casual_dining.local_tips: Try the whisky flight paired with different mash toppings.

casual_dining.name: The Outsider
casual_dining.atmosphere: Bright loft space overlooking the castle
casual_dining.booking_tips: Ask for a window seat when reserving for castle views.
casual_dining.local_tips: Daily specials highlight produce from East Lothian farms.

street_food.name: The Pitt
street_food.local_tips: Arrive early for the rotating guest traders and live DJs.

street_food.name: Edinburgh Street Food
street_food.local_tips: Scan QR codes to order from multiple vendors at once.

street_food.name: Stockbridge Market
street_food.local_tips: Bring cash for smaller producers and reusable bags for produce.

coffee_shops.name: Brew Lab
coffee_shops.local_tips: Ask baristas about guest roasters rotating weekly.

coffee_shops.name: Fortitude Coffee
coffee_shops.local_tips: Limited seating; grab beans to brew at your accommodation.

coffee_shops.name: Twelve Triangles
coffee_shops.local_tips: Pastries sell out by noon on weekends.

bars.name: Panda & Sons
bars.atmosphere: Hidden barbershop entrance with inventive mixology
bars.local_tips: Book a booth for theatrical table-side cocktails.

bars.name: The Devil's Advocate
bars.atmosphere: Victorian pump house with mezzanine dining
bars.local_tips: Ask staff for a tailored whisky flight based on your palate.

bars.name: Teuchters Landing
bars.atmosphere: Converted ferry waiting room with roaring stove
bars.food_options: Mac 'n' cheese in a mug, seafood pots
bars.local_tips: Visit in summer for drinks on the floating pontoon.

food_tours.name: Eat Walk Edinburgh
food_tours.booking_tips: Tours run rain or shine; wear comfortable shoes for cobblestones.

food_tours.name: Secret Food Tours
food_tours.focus: Grassmarket street food and hidden bakeries

cooking_classes.name: Edinburgh New Town Cookery School
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Book weekend classes a month ahead; vegetarian days available.

cooking_classes.name: The Pantry Workshops
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Workshops held monthly-join newsletter for release dates.

markets.name: Edinburgh Farmers' Market
markets.local_tips: Bring reusable bags and sample smoked salmon from local smokers.

markets.name: Leith Market
markets.local_tips: Combine with a stroll along the Shore for waterfront cafes.
